comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: This is apparently the son of the German ambassador to the US, Johann Heinrich von Bernstorff. There was a German diplomat of the same name a hundred years earlier, and the ambassador himself would have been about fifty at the time of this photo. I think the date on the right side says "12/11/17," which coincides with this article about his controversial marriage in the NYT: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9402E0DB1E3AE433A...
